70903.「この絶え間ない水音……。\n しんと 冷えきった空気……。:
The constant sound of the water... the still,
cold air...

70904.「そうです……。たしかに 私は\n ここに 幽閉されていました。: Yes... it's true, I was imprisoned here.

70906.「<cs_pchero>さま…… あの巨人が \n 私の記憶のカギを にぎってい:
<cs_pchero>... that giant seems to hold the
key to my memory... please help me...

70907.「すべて 思いだしました……。\n あの巨人は 私の罪悪感が\n 魔物となって:
I remembered everything... that giant was the
embodiment of my guilt, a monster...

70908.「そう……。私は この場所で\n あの子の声を聞いたんです。: Yes... I heard her voice in this place.

70909.「……そんなに泣いて どうしたのです テティ？:
...what's wrong with you crying so much,
Tetti?

70910.「あのね あのね シスター・サテラ。\n テティのパパの船 あらしのなかにいるの:
Hey, hey, hey, Sister Satella. Tetti's dad's
boat. She's in the storm.

70911.「パパ だいじょーぶかな……。\n ちゃんと ただいまーって かえれるかな……。:
Are you okay, Daddy... or should I say "I'm
home"?

70913.「テティ。昨夜 お祈りをしている時\n テティのパパの船を 空の上から見守ってい:
Tetti. Last night while we were praying, I
heard the stars watching over Tetti's dad's
boat from up in the sky.

70915.「星々は こう言っていたの。\n テティのパパは もうすぐ 無事に帰ります。:
The stars had this to say. Tetti's dad will be
home safe and sound soon.

70917.<center>はじめは 子供たちを励ますための\n小さなウソでした……。:
At first, it was just a little lie to cheer up
the kids...

70918.<center>テティの お父さまの船は無事に戻り……\nそれからも 私は何度か:
Tetti's father's ship returned safely...and
since then I have made several false
prophecies for the children.

70919.<center>そのうち…… 大人たちまでもが\n私の予言のチカラを\n本物だと:
In time... Even adults began to whisper about
the power of my prophecies...

70920.<center>そして あの日……\n取り返しのつかないことが 起こったのです。:
And that day... something irreversible
happened.

70921.「このひとよ！ このひとが シスター・サテラ！\n おほしさまの声が きけるの。:
That's her! This is Sister Satella! I can hear
the voice of the Holy Spirit.

70922.「……失礼します。 \n あなたが シスター・サテラ殿ですかな？: Excuse me. Are you Sister Satella?

70924.「先の世を見通すチカラをお持ちと\n ウワサに聞き及んでおります。そのチカラに\:
I have heard rumors that you have the power to
see into the future. I have come all the way
here to rely on that power.

70925.「我が国は 今 戦乱の中にあり \n 国王は 兵をさらに進めるべきか\n 退くべ:
Our country is now in the midst of war, and
the king is torn between advancing more troops
or retreating.

70926.「そこで 我が国王のため どうかひとつ\n 予言を授けては いただけまいか。:
Therefore, for the sake of our king, I ask you
to grant me a prophecy.

70928.「聖職にあるとはいえ あなたも ひとりの\n 国民として 国を思う気持ちは変わり:
Although you are in the ministry, you are still a citizen of this country, and your feelings for your country will never change.
Lord Satella... please...

70929.「シスター・サテラ……。\n このおじさん とても こまってるみたいよ。:
Sister Satella... this uncle seems to be in a
lot of trouble.

70931.「ほ…星々が 未来を告げています。\n 今の状況では 兵を……:
The stars tell of the future. As things stand
now, we need soldiers...

70933.「強き意志を 持つ者にこそ……\n 勝利の女神は ほほえむでしょう……。:
Only those with a strong will will be able to
win the war.

70934.「兵を進めるべき……。なるほど。\n それが そなたの 予言なのですな？: I see. Is that your prophecy?

70935.「ありがとうございます。\n では 我が王に そのように伝えましょう。:
Thank you very much. Then I will tell my king
so.

70936.<center>私の その予言は……\n悲劇の元凶になりました。:
That prophecy of mine... turned out to be the
source of the tragedy.

70937.<center>私の 偽りの予言通りに\nその国の王が 兵を進めた結果……:
As per my false prophecy, The king of that
land advanced his army, and as a result...

70938.<center>その進軍は 敵に読まれていました。\n兵士たちの進んだ先には 罠:
The enemy had read their advance. The soldiers' advance was trailed by traps, and the army was destroyed without being able to
do anything about it...

70939.<center>私は 偽りの予言をした罪で\nこのナギリ洞に 閉じ込められました:
I was locked up in this Nagiri Cave for making
false prophecies.

70940.「……こんな大きな罪 私には つぐなえない。: I cannot bear such a great sin.

70941.「もしも 予言のチカラが本物だったら \n 私は 誰も……。:
If the power of prophecy were real, I don't
think anyone would...

70946.「ボク……帰らなくちゃいけなくて……。\n だけど 追いだされてしまったから\n:
I had to go home but I couldn't go home alone
because they kicked me out.

70948.「おねえちゃん ボクといっしょに\n 帰ってくれないかな。おねえちゃんと\n い:
Young lady, will you come home with me? I'm
sure I can go home with you.

70949.「そしたら ボク…… おねえちゃんの頼み\n どんなことでも きいてあげるから！: And I'll do whatever you ask, young lady!

70950.「……あなたは 不思議な方ですね。\n もしや 神さまの お使いなのでしょうか。:
You are a mysterious person, aren't you? Are
you a messenger of God?

70951.「どうか 私の懺悔を お聞きください……。\n 私は ある国の人々に 偽りの予言:
Please hear my confession... that I have
caused the people of a certain country to die
by telling them false prophecies.

70952.「もし私に 本当の予言のチカラがあれば \n あの人々を 死なさずに済んだのに…:
If I had the power of true prophecy, I
wouldn't have let those people die.

70953.「それが おねえちゃんの願いなんだね？\n わかった。それじゃあ 目を閉じて……:
That's what young lady wants, isn't it? I
understand. Then, close your eyes...

70955.「歌が……聴こえます……。\n これは 星が歌っているの……？:
I can... hear... a song... is this the stars
singing...?

70956.「これで ボクといっしょに帰ってくれるよね？: Now you'll come home with me, right?

70959.「……すべて 思いだしました。 \n 何が 私を 世告げの姫として\n 動かして:
I remembered everything. What drove me to
become the Oracle Princess.

70960.「しかし 後悔はありません……。\n 世告げの姫として 人々を救うことが\n 少:
But I have no regrets... if saving people as
Oracle Princess can atone for my sins, even if
only a little...

70961.「それに 世告げの姫としての使命が終わったら \n 私は あの教会へ戻り 本当の:
Besides, when my mission as Oracle Princess is over, I can return to that Church and reach out to the lost with the power of true
prophecy...

70962.「<cs_pchero>さま ありがとうございます。\n この記憶があれば 災厄:
<cs_pchero> Thank you. With this memory we
shall be able to defeat the illusions of the
King of Calamity.

70963.「こちらは 心ばかりの お礼になります。\n 災厄の王との決戦に お役立てくださ:
This is just a small token of our
appreciation. Please make use of it in your
battle against the King of Calamity.

70964.「<cs_pchero>さま 覚えておいでですか？\n 幾千の星が舞い散った あ:
<cs_pchero> Do you remember? The day when
thousands of stars danced in the sky...

70965.「あの時より 何度も救っていただいて\n <cs_pchero>さまは 見違える:
Since then, <cs_pchero> has been saved many
times and you have become stronger than ever.

70966.「舵取りのマレンが <cs_pchero>さまのことを \n 待っているはずです:
I'm sure Maren at the helm is waiting for
<cs_pchero>. Next time, please save her.

70967.「……星々は やがて歌うでしょう。\n <cs_pchero>さまの 勝利の歌を:
...the stars will soon sing. The triumphant
song of <cs_pchero>...
